com.github.thunder413.datetimeutils

Class DateTimeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.thunder413.datetimeutils.DateTimeUtils

  • public class DateTimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    DateTimeUtils This class contains a bunch of function that can manipulate Date object or Date String to achieve certain operations e.g : Time difference, Time Ago, Date formatting
